item.title: Logic
item.description: Types [[Predicate Logic.md]] Other Logics Everything we’ve seen so far is [[Monotonic.md]]: once it’s in the knowledge base, it can’t be removed

item.title: Predicate Logic
item.description: Overview Predicate logic allows us to make statements about categories Features Arity: Arity 0: $win()$ Arity 1: $Student(\text{Bill})$ Arity 2: $Parent(\text{John}, \text{Martha})$ Also allows us to use existential ($\exists$) and universal ($\forall$) quantifiers All aliens drive flying saucers $\forall{x}: \text{Alien}(x) \implies \text{DrivesSaucer}(x)$ How would we prove $\neg{(\forall{x}: \text{Alien}(x) \implies \text{DrivesSaucer}(x)})$?
